availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Boonesboro, Kentucky native. Married to Cornelia Wheat Bush. Father of Samuel Stone Bush. Graduated Bethany College's law course in 1858. Practiced in partnership with Henry C. Shivell.

bibl.p: Charles Kerr, ed., History of Kentucky, Vol. III (Chicago: American Historical Society, 1922), 374. Edward, Greenough, and DeVed, eds., Edwardsâ€™ Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business Firms, Etc., Etc. in the City of Louisville, for 1864 (Louisville: Edward, Greenough, & DeVed, 1864), 187.
